Spelling Games

Here are some really cool and exciting spelling games. Have a go and see if you can challenge yourself!



  • Cover. Write. Check
  • Dinosaur Eggs
  • Spelling Bee
  • Plank
  • Pirate Spelling
  • Hanging Monkeys
  • Rain Catcher
  • Royal Spelling Bee

Useful Phonics Games

There are lots of phonics games that can help you to get better and continue to improve your work, outside of class. Remember, when we use our phonics reading and writing is much easier, especially when we really think about and remember what each sound is. Have a go and see how many you can play.



  • Letters and Sounds
  • ICT Literacy Games
  • DJ Cow
  • Topmarks Phonics Tools
  • Phonics Play

Top Tips

Reading is Miss Alexandra's favourite thing to do! When we read we get to use our imagination and find out all about cool new worlds and even learn some new words, facts and/or things about ourself. We are always busy practicing our reading in class and we are getting better all the time. Take a look at some of these websites and remember to use your phonics to help you with any tricky words! How many can you read?

P.s. Some of these are for grown ups to help you to get even better at reading than you already are! :)


  • Reading tips - English/Reading tips - Spanish
  • BugClub Reading
  • Oxford Owl
  • My Online Reading
  • Reading Comprehension
